2275    def _create_thread(self, handler, *args):
2276        """Helper method to create and start a thread"""
2277        if handler:
2278            thread = threading.Thread(target=handler, args=args, daemon=True)
2279            thread.start()
2280            self._threads.append(thread)
2281
2282    def _handle_message(self, message, update):
2283        """Handle different types of messages"""
2284        msg_data = update.get('message', {})
2285
2286        if 'new_chat_members' in msg_data and hasattr(
2287                self, '_member_join_handler'):
2288            chat, user = msg_data['chat'], msg_data['new_chat_members'][0]
2289            self._create_thread(
2290                self._member_join_handler,
2291                message,
2292                Chat(self, {"ok": True, "result": chat}),
2293                User(self, {"ok": True, "result": user})
2294            )
2295            return
2296
2297        if 'left_chat_member' in msg_data and hasattr(
2298                self, '_member_leave_handler'):
2299            chat, user = msg_data['chat'], msg_data['left_chat_member']
2300            self._create_thread(
2301                self._member_leave_handler,
2302                message,
2303                Chat(self, {"ok": True, "result": chat}),
2304                User(self, {"ok": True, "result": user})
2305            )
2306            return
2307
2308        if 'text' in msg_data and hasattr(self, '_text_handlers'):
2309            text = msg_data['text']
2310            for command, handler in self._text_handlers.items():
2311                if text.startswith(command):
2312                    conds = conditions(
2313                        self, message.author, message, None, message.chat)
2314                    params = inspect.signature(handler).parameters
2315                    args = (message, conds) if len(params) > 1 else (message,)
2316                    self._create_thread(handler, *args)
2317                    return
2318
2319        if hasattr(self, '_message_handler'):
2320            conds = conditions(
2321                self,
2322                message.author,
2323                message,
2324                None,
2325                message.chat)
2326            params = inspect.signature(self._message_handler).parameters
2327            args = ((message, update, conds) if len(params) > 2 else
2328                    (message, update) if len(params) > 1 else (message,))
2329            self._create_thread(self._message_handler, *args)
2330
2331    def _handle_update(self, update):
2332        if hasattr(self, '_update_handler'):
2333            self._create_thread(self._update_handler, update)
2334
2335        # Handle message and edited message
2336        message_types = {
2337            'message': (Message, self._handle_message),
2338            'edited_message': (Message, lambda m, u: self._create_thread(self._message_edit_handler, m, u) if hasattr(self, '_message_edit_handler') else None)
2339        }
2340
2341        for update_type, (cls, handler) in message_types.items():
2342            if update_type in update:
2343                message = cls(
2344                    self, {
2345                        'ok': True, 'result': update[update_type]})
2346                handler(message, update)
2347                return
2348
2349        if 'callback_query' in update and hasattr(self, '_callback_handler'):
2350            obj = CallbackQuery(
2351                self, {
2352                    'ok': True, 'result': update['callback_query']})
2353            params = inspect.signature(self._callback_handler).parameters
2354            conds = conditions(self, obj.author, None, obj, obj.chat)
2355            args = (obj, update, conds) if len(params) > 2 else (obj, update)
2356            self._create_thread(self._callback_handler, *args)
2357
2358    def _handle_tick_events(self, current_time):
2359        """Handle periodic tick events"""
2360        if hasattr(self, '_tick_handlers'):
2361            for handler, info in self._tick_handlers.items():
2362                if current_time - info['last_run'] >= info['interval']:
2363                    self._create_thread(handler)
2364                    info['last_run'] = current_time
2365
2366    def run(self, debug=False):
2367        """Start polling for new messages"""
2368        try:
2369            self.user = self.get_me()
2370        except BaseException:
2371            raise BaleTokenNotFoundError("token not found")
2372
2373        self._polling = True
2374        self._threads = []
2375        offset = 0
2376        past_updates = set()
2377        source_file = inspect.getfile(self.__class__)
2378        last_modified = os.path.getmtime(source_file)
2379
2380        if self.auto_log_start_message:
2381            print(f"-+-+-+ [logged in as @{self.get_me().username}] +-+-+-")
2382        if hasattr(self, '_ready_handler'):
2383            self._ready_handler()
2384
2385        while self._polling:
2386            try:
2387                if debug:
2388                    current_modified = os.path.getmtime(source_file)
2389                    if current_modified > last_modified:
2390                        last_modified = current_modified
2391                        print("Source file changed, restarting...")
2392                        python = sys.executable
2393                        os.execl(python, python, *sys.argv)
2394
2395                updates = self.get_updates(offset=offset)
2396                for update in updates:
2397                    update_id = update['update_id']
2398                    if update_id not in past_updates:
2399                        self._handle_update(update)
2400                        offset = update_id + 1
2401                        past_updates.add(update_id)
2402                        if len(past_updates) > 100:
2403                            past_updates = set(
2404                                sorted(list(past_updates))[-50:])
2405
2406                current_time = time.time()
2407                self._handle_tick_events(current_time)
2408                self._threads = [t for t in self._threads if t.is_alive()]
2409                time.sleep(0.1)
2410            except Exception:
2411                print(f"Error in polling: {traceback.format_exc()}")
2412                time.sleep(1)
2413
2414    def _check_source_file_changed(self, source_file, last_modified):
2415        try:
2416            current_mtime = os.path.getmtime(source_file)
2417            return current_mtime != last_modified
2418        except (FileNotFoundError, OSError) as e:
2419            print(f"Error checking file modification time: {e}")
2420            return False
2421
2422    def get_updates(self, offset=None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
2423        params = {'offset': offset} if offset is not None else {}
2424        response = self._make_request('GET', 'getUpdates', params=params)
2425        return response.get('result', [])
2426
2427    def safe_close(self):
2428        """Close the client and stop polling"""
2429        self._polling = False
2430        for thread in self._threads:
2431            thread.join(timeout=1.0)
2432        self._threads.clear()
2433        if hasattr(self, '_close_handler'):
2434            self._close_handler()
2435
2436    def create_ref_link(self, data: str):
2437        return f"https://ble.ir/{self.get_me().username}?start={data}"

def send_chat_action( self, chat: Union[int, str, Chat], action: str, how_many_times: int = 1) -> bool: 
2138    def send_chat_action(self,
2139                         chat: Union[int,
2140                                     str,
2141                                     'Chat'],
2142                         action: str,
2143                         how_many_times: int = 1) -> bool:
2144        """Send a chat action"""
2145        if not chat:
2146            raise ValueError("Chat ID cannot be empty")
2147
2148        data = {
2149            'chat_id': str(chat) if isinstance(
2150                chat, (int, str)) else str(
2151                chat.id), 'action': action}
2152        res = []
2153        for _ in range(how_many_times):
2154            response = self._make_request('POST', 'sendChatAction', json=data)
2155            res.append(response.get('ok', False))
2156        return all(res)

Send a chat action

def run(self, debug=False): 
2366    def run(self, debug=False):
2367        """Start polling for new messages"""
2368        try:
2369            self.user = self.get_me()
2370        except BaseException:
2371            raise BaleTokenNotFoundError("token not found")
2372
2373        self._polling = True
2374        self._threads = []
2375        offset = 0
2376        past_updates = set()
2377        source_file = inspect.getfile(self.__class__)
2378        last_modified = os.path.getmtime(source_file)
2379
2380        if self.auto_log_start_message:
2381            print(f"-+-+-+ [logged in as @{self.get_me().username}] +-+-+-")
2382        if hasattr(self, '_ready_handler'):
2383            self._ready_handler()
2384
2385        while self._polling:
2386            try:
2387                if debug:
2388                    current_modified = os.path.getmtime(source_file)
2389                    if current_modified > last_modified:
2390                        last_modified = current_modified
2391                        print("Source file changed, restarting...")
2392                        python = sys.executable
2393                        os.execl(python, python, *sys.argv)
2394
2395                updates = self.get_updates(offset=offset)
2396                for update in updates:
2397                    update_id = update['update_id']
2398                    if update_id not in past_updates:
2399                        self._handle_update(update)
2400                        offset = update_id + 1
2401                        past_updates.add(update_id)
2402                        if len(past_updates) > 100:
2403                            past_updates = set(
2404                                sorted(list(past_updates))[-50:])
2405
2406                current_time = time.time()
2407                self._handle_tick_events(current_time)
2408                self._threads = [t for t in self._threads if t.is_alive()]
2409                time.sleep(0.1)
2410            except Exception:
2411                print(f"Error in polling: {traceback.format_exc()}")
2412                time.sleep(1)

Start polling for new messages

def get_updates(self, offset=None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]: 
2422    def get_updates(self, offset=None) -> List[Dict[str, Any]]:
2423        params = {'offset': offset} if offset is not None else {}

2425        return response.get('result', [])
def safe_close(self): 
2427    def safe_close(self):
2428        """Close the client and stop polling"""
2429        self._polling = False
2430        for thread in self._threads:
2431            thread.join(timeout=1.0)
2432        self._threads.clear()
2433        if hasattr(self, '_close_handler'):
2434            self._close_handler()

Close the client and stop polling
